thread.title: A weekend in Rome in March 2017
thread.title_full: A weekend in Rome in March 2017 - Review of Rome Times Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: SusanWhittall
title: A weekend in Rome in March 2017
text: The hotel is absolutely ideally situated for all metro and for the walk(s) to the city. The room was spacious and very, very clean. The staff were very friendly and being as it was 2 ladies on a weekend in Rome, the prosecco that we had was fabulous. The whole experience was magical, the breakfast was buffett style but the choice was overwhelming and delicious.
